title: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression is set for row[0]
description: When setting a filter with the expression "row[0] equals to 0", an incorrect data set result is returned. It should either return a null result set or pop up a relevant error message instead.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to 0" and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned when it should not be.
EB: A relevant error message should pop up when setting an invalid filter expression for row[0].
SR:
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to 0"
2. Click on the Preview tab

Expected result: A relevant error message should appear and prevent the incorrect data set result from being shown.
